nodes.text: An Exclusive Interview with George Lucas
An Exclusive Interview with George Lucas is an article in Star Wars Insider 26 in 1995.
It details George Lucas' reflections on the Original trilogy and how he was preparing for the upcoming Prequel trilogy.

He notably answers the questions about the Sequel trilogy - stating he'll think about it after completing the prequel trilogy. The sequel trilogy was later officially announced in 2012 when Lucas sold Lucasfilm Ltd. to Disney.
